author: daxian-dbw
body: Those files are shown as modified on Linux. Replace CRLF with LF.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw for License.rtf, I think we should retain the CRLF EOLs since it shows up in the msi (not sure how it handles just LF).  I created a PR to not have git try to convert it https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5020

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: OK, I will revert the changes to .rtf.

title: Replace CRLF with LF for some files in assets
